com.intercom.media

类 VideoCapture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intercom.media.VideoCapture
  • 直接已知子类:
    VideoCaptureCamera, VideoCaptureCamera2

    public abstract class VideoCapture
extends java.lang.Object
    Video Capture Device base class, defines a set of methods that native code needs to use to configure, start capture, and to be reached by callbacks and provides some neccesary data type(s) with accessors.
